directions: In all problems, you may neglect air resistance. Please solve each problem to 3 significant figures of accuracy.
note: my last idea is not yet included, i need to adjust to practice page first

questions.text: A car drives horizontally at a speed of 23.5 m/s off of a cliff that is 18.2 m tall. How far will the car land from the edge of the cliff?
A super slow car drives horizontally at a speed of 0.155 m/s off of a very scary cliff that is 230. m tall nHow far will the car land from the edge of the cliff?
A car drives horizontally at a speed of 20.3 m/s off a cliff and lands a distance 95.8 m from the side of the cliff. How tall was the cliff?
A car drives off a cliff that was 34.8 meters tall and lands a distance of 87.8 m from the edge. How fast was it moving when it drove off the cliff?
(not counted towards your final score) A car drives horizontally off a cliff that is 30.0 m tall with a speed of 15.0 m/s. With what speed does it strike the ground?
